definition.name: Discord Message Notify
definition.description: Send a message to a Discord channel using a webhook. This action allows you to notify a Discord channel by sending a message through a webhook.
definition.author: Bo-Yi Wu

inputs.name: webhook_url
inputs.description: The URL of the Discord webhook. This is the endpoint where the message will be sent.

inputs.name: webhook_id
inputs.description: The ID of the Discord webhook. This is a unique identifier for the webhook.

inputs.name: webhook_token
inputs.description: The token of the Discord webhook. This token is used to authenticate the webhook.

inputs.name: message
inputs.description: The content of the message to send. The message can be up to 2000 characters long.

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: The content of the file to send. You can attach a file to the message.

inputs.name: color
inputs.description: The color code for the embed message. This sets the color of the embed's side border.

inputs.name: wait
inputs.description: Wait for server confirmation before responding. If set to true, the action will return the created message body.

inputs.name: tts
inputs.description: Set to true if the message should be read aloud using text-to-speech. This enables the text-to-speech feature for the message.

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: Override the default username of the webhook. This allows you to set a custom username for the message sender.

inputs.name: avatar_url
inputs.description: Override the default avatar of the webhook. This allows you to set a custom avatar for the message sender.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Enable debug mode. If set to true, the action will output the request and response details.
